lexUnit.name: burrow.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: dig into or through something solid.

sentence.text: He hugged her , and Jehan burrowed in between them .
Eyes are of little use , burrowing underground and often they have become covered in skin .
It is difficult to get the bottom strained tight enough to prevent a small lamb from burrowing underneath , and the lengths are not easy to roll up neatly after use .
Some trilobites lost their eyes , probably those that burrowed in mud or lived in lightless parts of the ocean .
The descendants of Lingulella , slightly larger and called Lingula , are found today in , among other places , the coastal waters of Japan , burrowing in the sand and mud of estuaries .
The child stirred and burrowed deeper into the bed .
Indian journalists are busily burrowing into the business affairs of the prime minister 's family , and there are signs they might find something embarrassing .
Mr Berkley slipped into the Palladium by a side-e-it , and burrowed gratefully into the darkness .
Instead of burrowing into the foliage it makes its home in the stems of aquatic plants .
The spell had leapt out of the page and instantly burrowed deeply into his mind , from whence even the combined talents of the Faculty of Medicine had been unable to coax it .
They hibernate during the dry season by burrowing deep into the damp sand .
It burrows into the soil and hollows out a sound chamber at the base of the burrow .
Still others have taken to burrowing into wood or even into limestone , and fossils of these curious animals can be found lying in their home-made burrows ( see p. 21 ) .
The pain burrowed through Léonie , tore at her with sharp claws .
This is a contagious infection caused by mites burrowing under the skin ( mange is a term used for any condition caused by mites which causes itching and results in a mammal losing its fur ) .
Burning with mortification , Leonora looked away , sliding lower beneath the quilt like an animal burrowing for cover as Penry sat on the edge of the bed .

Throwing down the last of the whisky with a shudder , she switched off the bedside lamp and burrowed down beneath the covers , already aware that the alcohol was having an effect , sending tentacles of warmth through her veins .
One group have lost their legs altogether and taken to burrowing underground .
